amendment.description: To ensure that if the Keystone XL Pipeline is built, it will be built safely and in compliance with United States environmental laws.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 131 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 131 proposed by Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S520-521; text: CR S520) To ensure that if the Keystone XL Pipeline is built, it will be built safely and in compliance with United States environmental laws.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 131 proposed by Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2.
